        public static void maintainDisappointedAnticipations​(Parameters narParameters,
                                                     Concept concept,
                                                     Nar nar)
        Process outdated anticipations within the concept, these which are outdated generate negative feedback
        Parameters:
        narParameters - The reasoner parameters
        concept - The concept which potentially outdated anticipations should be processed
        nar - the reasoner
